quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.

quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.

quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.

quote: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched, they must be felt with the heart.

quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.

quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.

quote: What we think, we become.

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.

title: Spiritual Teacher

quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.

title: Spiritual Teacher

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.

quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.

title: Spiritual Teacher

quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.

quote: A jug fills drop by drop.

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.

title: Humanitarian & Saint

quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.

quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.

quote: Peace begins with a smile.

title: Humanitarian & Saint

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.

title: Humanitarian & Saint

quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.

title: Humanitarian & Saint

quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
author: Mother Teresa
title: Humanitarian & Saint

quote: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.

title: Humanitarian & Saint

quote: The biggest disease this day and age is that of people feeling unloved.

title: Humanitarian & Saint

quote: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
author: Abraham Lincoln
title: 16th U.S. President

quote: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.

title: 16th U.S. President

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.

title: 16th U.S. President

quote: Character is like a tree and reputation like a shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

quote: I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down.

quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.

quote: You can tell the greatness of a man by what makes him angry.

quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.

quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy.

quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.

quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.

title: Technology Innovator

title: Technology Innovator

quote: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.

author: Steve Jobs
title: Technology Innovator

quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
author: Steve Jobs
title: Technology Innovator

quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards.
author: Steve Jobs
title: Technology Innovator

quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: We are the change that we seek.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don't have time to feel sorry for myself. I don't have time to complain. I'm going to press on.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: Our destiny is not written for us, but by us.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: The only thing that is the end of the world is the end of the world.
author: Barack Obama
title: 44th U.S. President

quote: Be humble. Be hungry. And always be the hardest worker in the room.
author: Dwayne Johnson
title: Actor & Former Athlete

quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success.
author: Dwayne Johnson
title: Actor & Former Athlete

quote: Blood, sweat, and respect. First two you give, last one you earn.
author: Dwayne Johnson
title: Actor & Former Athlete

quote: Don't be afraid to be ambitious about your goals. Hard work never stops.
author: Dwayne Johnson
title: Actor & Former Athlete

quote: All successes begin with self-discipline. It starts with you.
author: Dwayne Johnson
title: Actor & Former Athlete

quote: Seek respect, not attention. It lasts longer.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour
title: Entrepreneur & Author

quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one.
author: George R.R. Martin
title: Author

quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.
author: George R.R. Martin
title: Author

quote: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
author: Henry Ward Beecher
title: Clergyman & Social Reformer

quote: Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do.
author: Voltaire
title: Philosopher & Writer

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: To see what is right and not do it is a lack of courage.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Study the past if you would define the future.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Respect yourself and others will respect you.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: He who knows all the answers has not been asked all the questions.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: The superior man is modest in his speech but exceeds in his actions.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.
author: Confucius
title: Philosopher

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: The lion is most handsome when looking for food.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: There is a voice that doesn't use words. Listen.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Let the beauty we love be what we do.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: The art of knowing is knowing what to ignore.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Be grateful for whoever comes, because each has been sent as a guide from beyond.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic

quote: Wherever you stand, be the soul of that place.
author: Rumi
title: Poet & Mystic
